inclusion.criterion: hysterectomy or myomectomy planned for a benign gynecologic reason
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient is scheduled to have surgery with one of the minimally invasive gynecologic surgeons at George Washington University Hospital (GWUH)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient is planned for a robotic assisted total laparoscopic hysterectomy (RA-TLH) or a total laparoscopic hysterectomy (TLH) or robotic assisted or laparoscopic myomectomy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient is capable of informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the patient has no baseline urinary disease
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: hysterectomy or myomectomy is indicated for malignancy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and underwent multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He also had a severe urethral stricture that required surgical intervention.
